title: These Healthy Buffalo Chicken Egg Muffins Have 22 Grams Of Protein
author: Isadora Baum; Lauryn Higgins
description: Trust me, you're going to want to make a double batch.
cleaned_text: 30 High-Protein Meals That Are Just As Easy To Whip Up As They Are Delicious So much more exciting than grilled chicken breast. [Isadora Baum](/author/217302/isadora-baum/)and [Lauryn Higgins](/author/263211/lauryn-higgins/) [Protein](https://www.womenshealthmag.com/food/a41958183/how-much-proten-do-you-need/) is not only super-important for building strong, lean muscles, it's also a rich source of energy for your body. It keeps your metabolism revved throughout the day, says nutritionist [Kelly Jones](https://kellyjonesnutrition.com/), RD. It fills you up too. "Since protein moves more slowly through the stomach than carbohydrates and fat, it can contribute to feelings of fullness," says Jones. So, eating high-protein meals (that also pack some fat and fiber) can help you stave off mindless snacking throughout the day. The [USDA recommends](https://healthyeating.sfgate.com/usda-protein-requirements-grams-8619.html) that women consume 46 grams of protein daily. And protein is especially important for anyone who regularly hits up bootcamp class or never misses a gym day. That said, many factors affect how much protein your body needs, says nutritionist [Roxana Ehsani](https://roxanaehsani.com/), RDN. "Women on a caloric restriction diet could benefit from consuming higher amounts of protein to help preserve lean body mass," she explains. "If a person wants to gain weight, it might be helpful to bump up their protein as well to help them eat more calories." If you're [vegetarian or vegan](https://www.womenshealthmag.com/food/a25804908/plant-based-diet/), you may need to increase your intake too. A pro tip for figuring out exactly how much protein you should eat at each meal: Multiply your weight in pounds by 0.13, Jones says. For a 130-pound person, that's about 17 grams per meal; for a 200-pound person, that's about 26 grams. If you don't feel like doing the math, packing anywhere between 15 and 35 grams of protein per meal is ideal, according to Ehsani. "You can easily achieve this amount with a four-ounce serving of chicken, two eggs paired with whole-grain toast, or tofu paired with [quinoa](https://www.womenshealthmag.com/food/a23570613/quinoa-health-benefits/)," says Jones. Other [great sources of protein](https://www.womenshealthmag.com/food/a19892506/high-protein-foods/) include meat, seafood, eggs, Greek yogurt, beans, lentils, and nuts and seeds. There are so many options out there. Get started with one of these 30 high-protein meals. Vegan Grain Bowl with Pesto Farro and lentils make this bowl oh-so filling. Double up on the pesto and use the leftovers all week long. Per serving: 210 calories, 12 g fat (2 g saturated), 440 mg sodium, 4 g carbs, 1 g fiber, 2 g sugar, 24 g protein Isadora Baum is a freelance writer, certified health coach, and author of [5-Minute Energy](https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3A__www.simonandschuster.com_books_5-2DMinute-2DEnergy_Isadora-2DBaum_5-2DMinute_9781507208823&d=DwMFaQ&c=B73tqXN8Ec0ocRmZHMCntw&r=FzjNk5ElLI9lSAgVjmZEhFh9LHwb6rjXmIiSQBJNyJw&m=Gn8cyGA9mViEqRG3ubPyzqzycKuQ-El9qATKm5xFowI&s=Y5fg15oFpPPRE_cVyt6ZjoVUQRRbXBOBJ2iJAbivnfw&e=). She can't resist a good sample, a margarita, a new HIIT class, or an easy laugh. Learn more about her on her website: [isadorabaum.com](https://urldefense.proofpoint.com/v2/url?u=http-3A__isadorabaum.com&d=DwMFaQ&c=B73tqXN8Ec0ocRmZHMCntw&r=FzjNk5ElLI9lSAgVjmZEhFh9LHwb6rjXmIiSQBJNyJw&m=Gn8cyGA9mViEqRG3ubPyzqzycKuQ-El9qATKm5xFowI&s=0sCHt8vZW5FYVCyMtVl1tjvyr-Ujf9PtUBbI9jwc3Io&e=). Lauryn Higgins is a freelance journalist whose work focuses primarily on public health. Her work tracking the coronavirus for The New York Times was part of a team that won the 2021 Pulitzer Prize for Public Service. When she's not working she loves spending time in her kitchen and garden, taking barre classes and cuddling with the love of her life, her 90-pound bernedoodle, Gus. Her work has also appeared in NPR, Salon, Teen Vogue and Well + Good. 10 Best Plant-Based Vegan Meal Delivery Services No-Cook Tomato Sauce With Spaghetti Recipe 41 Breakfast Smoothies For Weight Loss Chard and Summer Squash Pizza Recipe
